arStrings.szText: Cormond says there is a Hall of Records beneath Orbei Monastery. It may hold knowledge on his Cages of Binding, but the path is dangerous. I must accompany Cormond into the crypts.
Cormond says there is a Hall of Records beneath Orbei Monastery. It may hold knowledge on his Cages of Binding, but the path is dangerous. I must accompany Cormond into the crypts.
Bring Cormond to the Sealed Door
We found the Hall of Records untouched beneath the ruins of Orbei. I must search for knowledge on “Cages of Binding.”
Among the old entries, I found mention of the Cages of Binding. I should show it to Cormond and see if this is what he has been looking for.
We found a lead pointing to Hawezar but a powerful Malignant attacked and called Cormond by name. Cormond ran off. I will follow once the threat is dealt with.
Cormond managed to open the sealed door into the Orbei Hall of Records. We don’t yet know the state of these “records.” Let us hope we find them intact.
Find the Records Room with Cormond
We found a lead pointing to Hawezar but a powerful Malignant attacked and called Cormond by name. Cormond ran off. I will follow once the threat is dealt with.
We found a lead pointing to Hawezar but a powerful Malignant attacked and called Cormond by name. Cormond ran off. I will follow once the threat is dealt with.
Cormond says there is a Hall of Records beneath Orbei Monastery. It may hold knowledge on his Cages of Binding, but the path is dangerous. I must accompany Cormond into the crypts.
